Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI is very unhelpful with feedback as I don't really trust the technical answers it gives as I've found them to be correct half the time. It sometimes can help with writing however I feel it takes all tone of voice out of the text.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response:
GenAI = aimless
teacher = pretty spot on, feel like by adjusting it I will get the marks.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: more specific and tailored to the actual subject, also more authentic when speaking to a teacher. Also doesn't go around in circles.
